traits.locale_text: A melee-attack inflicting the bleeding and reducing the target's AP and MP by −2 for 2 rounds. Resistance tests against the Cloud Mind have a −30 penalty.

A {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g}-attack the inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} and reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} by −2 for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Resistance tests{/g} against the Cloud Mind have a −30 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}攻击会使目标{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}，令目标的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}降低2点，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此外，对抗{g|f:9934b2c0db3845c58489a87b2bc0b448}蒙蔽思想{/g}能力时，{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}会受到−30{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Kanamaya{/g} sebep olan ve hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} ile {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g}'sini 2'şer puan azaltan bir {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} saldırısı.
